item.title: 苹果公司在重组中将健康和健身部门转移到服务部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司正准备扩大一些高层管理人员的职务，以应对长期担任首席运营官的杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）即将离职的情况。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing to expand the roles of some top executives in response to the pending departure of longtime Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对人工智能和芯片持乐观态度，三星股价有望创新高
item.description: 三星电子公司股价大涨，有望创下收盘历史新高，这得益于投资者对其人工智能芯片潜力的热情，以及对其传统内存业务的新信心。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. shares jumped, on track to close at an all-time high, riding investor enthusiasm for its potential in artificial intelligence chips and renewed confidence in its conventional memory business.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，优衣库仍保持强劲增长，快速零售业因此获益
item.description: 优衣库的所有者Fast Retailing Co.公布北美地区收入和利润实现两位数增长后，其股价攀升至六个月来的最高点，因为该公司在美国的扩张抵御了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统今年早些时候引发的关税波动。【原文：Uniqlo owner Fast Retailing Co.’s shares climbed the most in six months after reporting double-digit revenue and profit growth in North America, as its US expansion defied tariff volatility sparked by President Donald Trump earlier this year.】

item.title: 全球市场飙升，泰国央行担心经济脱节
item.description: 泰国央行认为，全球实体经济与屡创新高的金融市场之间的脱节令人担忧，尽管全球贸易发生了越来越多的变化，但资产价格却在飙升。【原文：The disconnect between the real economy and record-high financial markets worldwide is worrying, according to the Bank of Thailand, as asset prices soar despite mounting shifts in global trade.】

item.title: 墨西哥国会因议员担忧而停止对华关税辩论
item.description: 据一位国会议员透露，墨西哥立法者将在 11 月底之前暂停讨论一项政府提案，即对从中国和几个与墨西哥没有贸易协议的亚洲国家进口的汽车、钢铁和其他产品征收高达 50%的关税。【原文：Mexican lawmakers will pause until late November the discussion of a government proposal to impose tariffs of as much as 50% on cars, steel and other products imported from China and several Asian nations that don’t have a trade deal with the country, according to a top congressman.】

item.title: 大额美元空头正变成投资者的痛苦交易
item.description: 今年以来，在每天 9.6 万亿美元的外汇市场上，押注美元一直是最主要的交易方式，但这一赌注开始步履蹒跚。【原文：Betting against the dollar has been the dominant trade this year in the $9.6 trillion-a-day foreign exchange market, but the wager is starting to stumble.】

item.title: 中国芯片股估值飙升考验交易员耐心
item.description: 在过去几个月里，中国的芯片股在国家自给自足的推动下上演了一出举世瞩目的大涨行情，但一些投资者开始对它们的高估值望而却步。【原文：China’s chip stocks have staged a world-beating rally in the past few months on the nation’s self-sufficiency push, but some investors are beginning to balk at their lofty valuations.】

item.title: 日本顶级银行首席执行官力推人工智能，缓解对人力工作的担忧
item.description: 日本最大金融公司的负责人正竭力消除人们对人工智能会抢走工作岗位的担忧。【原文：The heads of Japan’s biggest financial firms are going out of their way to assuage worries that artificial intelligence will take away jobs.】

item.title: 投资者锁定涨幅，金银从高位回落
item.description: 黄金在上一交易日跌破每盎司 4,000 美元后企稳，而白银的跌幅扩大，因为投资者在白银价格涨至 1980 年以来最高点后获利了结。【原文：Gold steadied after falling below $4,000 an ounce in the previous session, while silver extended losses as investors took profits following a rally that sent prices to the highest since 1980.】

item.title: 新西兰财政部长对经济好转充满信心
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）对该国经济表示乐观，称快速降息将有助于促进今年年底和2026年的经济增长。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis expressed optimism about the country’s economy, saying rapid interest-rate cuts will help boost growth late this year and in 2026.】

item.title: 关注加沙计划和全球供应，石油保持大幅下跌态势
item.description: 由于对中东紧张局势缓解和供应前景持谨慎乐观态度，石油创下一周来最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest decline in a week on cautious optimism about easing tensions in the Middle East and the outlook for supply.】

item.title: 塔塔信托公司董事将在新德里斥责裂痕后举行会议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，塔塔信托公司的董事们将于周五召开会议，此前政府官员本周介入，化解了这家间接控制塔塔集团的强大慈善机构的董事会争斗。【原文：The directors of Tata Trusts are set to meet Friday, people familiar with the matter said, after government officials stepped in this week to defuse a boardroom fight at the powerful philanthropic body, which indirectly controls the Tata Group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行布洛克称澳大利亚经济形势 "相当不错
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）周五表示，澳大利亚的经济状况 "相当不错"，通胀率在央行设定的2%-3%的目标范围内，劳动力市场仍然紧张。【原文：Australia’s economy is in a “pretty good spot” with inflation inside the central bank’s 2-3% target band and the labor market still tight, Governor Michele Bullock said Friday.】

item.title: 秘鲁在弹劾风波中将关键利率维持在三年最低水平
item.description: 在一场政治危机中，秘鲁将借贷成本维持在三年来的最低水平，因为秘鲁央行正在权衡其强劲增长和新兴市场最低通胀率的风险。【原文：Peru held borrowing costs at a three-year low amid a political crisis, as the central bank weighs risks to its combination of strong growth and one of the lowest inflation rate in emerging markets.】

item.title: First Brands 的官方债权人委员会包括 Raistone
item.description: 根据周四提交的一份法庭文件，First Brands Group 破产案中的无担保债权人官方委员会包括 Raistone 的一家附属公司，而 Raistone 是这家破产汽车零部件供应商最激烈的批评者之一。【原文：The official committee of unsecured creditors in First Brands Group insolvency case includes an affiliate to Raistone, one of the fiercest critics of the bankrupt auto-parts supplier, according to a Thursday court filing.】

item.title: 美国股市反弹乏力，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 周五早盘，美股涨势停滞，市场担心美股持续大涨后估值可能已经捉襟见肘，亚洲股市已做好回调的准备。【原文：Asian equities were primed for a pullback early Friday after a rally in US stocks stalled amid concern valuations may have become stretched following their relentless surge.】

item.title: 美国统计局召回员工以在月底前准备好 9 月份的 CPI 报告
item.description: 据劳工部一位知情官员透露，劳工统计局已召回工作人员，准备 9 月份的消费者价格指数报告。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics has recalled staff to prepare the September consumer price index report, according to a Labor Department official with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Brightline West 正在与投资者讨论 25 亿美元的债务转换事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Fortress 投资集团支持、在南加州和拉斯维加斯之间建设高速客运铁路的公司正在与债券持有人谈判，商讨在 11 月完成项目融资计划的最后期限之前，将 25 亿美元的市政债务换成新证券。【原文：The Fortress Investment Group-backed company building a high-speed passenger railroad between Southern California and Las Vegas is in talks with bondholders about exchanging $2.5 billion of municipal debt for new securities before a November deadline to complete a financing plan for the project, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃伦问对冲基金集团是否在阿根廷救助中扮演了角色
item.description: 民主党参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）要求一个代表对冲基金和其他资产管理公司的组织说明，在特朗普政府审议如何在市场动荡时期向阿根廷提供美国金融支持的过程中，该组织发挥了什么作用（如果有的话）。【原文：Democratic Senator Elizabeth Warren asked a group representing hedge funds and other asset managers to describe what role, if any, it played in the Trump administration’s deliberations over how to extend US financial support to Argentina during a period of market turmoil.】

item.title: Venture Global 在英国石油公司的液化天然气仲裁中败诉
item.description: Venture Global Inc. 在与英国石油公司（BP Plc）涉及液化天然气货物销售的纠纷中败诉，这是在这家美国液化天然气出口商在与壳牌公司（Shell Plc）的类似纠纷中胜诉八周后的一次意外失败。【原文：Venture Global Inc. lost a dispute with BP Plc involving the sale of liquefied natural gas cargoes, a surprise defeat that comes eight weeks after the US LNG exporter prevailed in a similar fight with Shell Plc.】

item.title: 尽管关税影响上升，但李维斯上调全年业绩展望
item.description: 李维斯公司（Levi Strauss & Co.【原文：Levi Strauss & Co. raised its full-year outlook and warned that tariffs are starting to bite.】

item.title: Aegon 垃圾债务主管为信用危机蔓延带来的痛苦做好准备
item.description: Aegon 资产管理公司认为，随着美国经济放缓和盈利受损，更多的高负债公司将陷入困境。【原文：More highly-indebted companies will tip into distress as the US economy slows and earnings suffer, according to Aegon Asset Management.】

item.title: OpenAI 对技术和市场的影响进入新阶段
item.description: OpenAI 已将自己定位为科技行业和更广泛经济领域中一个不断增长的领域的中心。但首先...【原文：OpenAI has positioned itself at the center of a growing swath of the tech sector and wider economy. But first…】

item.title: 稀土为何是中国与美国贸易战中的 "特朗普牌"？
item.description: 稀土是地球上最重要的原材料之一，深深嵌入了支撑现代生活的技术之中。然而，在中美贸易战爆发之前，很少有人听说过稀土。【原文：Rare earths are among the most critical raw materials on the planet, deeply embedded in the technologies that underpin modern life. Yet few people had even heard of them until the eruption of the US-China trade war thrust them into the limelight.】

item.title: 公司利用与白宫和特朗普的关系上市
item.description: 从只有一个客户的数据中心初创公司，到帮助形成投机性加密代币囤积者的特殊目的收购公司，在股票市场上筹集数亿美元的公司越来越多地吹嘘它们与唐纳德-特朗普总统的联系。【原文：From a data center startup with one customer to special purpose acquisition companies helping form hoarders of speculative crypto tokens, firms raising hundreds of millions of dollars in the equity market are increasingly touting their links to President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贝莱德、富兰克林减持波多黎各公用事业债务
item.description: 贝莱德财务管理公司和富兰克林顾问公司（Franklin Advisers）削减了对波多黎各电力公司债券的风险敞口，因为该实体的破产仍处于悬而未决的状态。【原文：BlackRock Financial Management and Franklin Advisers cut their exposure to Puerto Rico’s power utility bonds as the entity’s bankruptcy remains in limbo.】

item.title: 微软预测显示数据中心紧缩将持续到 2026 年
item.description: 微软公司数据中心紧缩的持续时间将超过该公司之前所描述的时间，这凸显了这家软件巨头在追赶云计算需求方面所面临的困境。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s data-center crunch will continue for longer than the company has previously outlined, underscoring the software giant’s struggles to keep up with cloud demand.】

item.title: Instagram 正在 "探索 "推出专门的电视应用以推动视频发展
item.description: Instagram正在探索建立一个专门的电视应用程序，作为深入推进视频业务的一部分，此举可以让Instagram视频出现在更多观众面前，同时也为YouTube提供了更多竞争机会，后者已经可以非常方便地在电视上观看视频。【原文：Instagram is exploring building a dedicated TV app as part of a deeper push into video, a move that could get Instagram videos in front of more viewers and also provide more competition for YouTube, which already makes it very easy to watch videos on a television.】

item.title: 前美联储官员认为极端天气将带来世俗 "冲击
item.description: 美联储负责气候风险的前高级官员表示，由于天气模式越来越极端，美国经济面临着一系列长期的结构性冲击。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s former top-ranking official overseeing climate risk says the US economy faces a series of long-term, structural shocks as a result of increasingly extreme weather patterns.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 与巴西监管机构合作推动制药业发展
item.description: MercadoLibre 公司正在与巴西监管机构进行谈判，以推动药店在该公司的本地市场上销售药品。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc. is in talks with Brazilian regulators as part of its push to allow pharmacies to sell medications on the company’s local marketplace.】
